creditline: Gift of Maymanah Farhat and Athir Shayota
description: Abstract image; arch shape in brown pigments with gold pigments in the inside in bottom center; rectangle shape in center with a textured raised chalice with a small tree extending out of it; thin black lines extending out of the chalice; black arch on top of brown arch with red, yellow, green and blue diagonal lines; two triangle shapes in LLC and LRC; black splotches, some with red and purple pigment throughout background; raised textured rectangle with word 'LOVE' inscribed in LLC; small white piece of paper with brown star at bottom and with text reading 'I searched for the mountain where I remembered the rainbow; I did not know it lay now under the Dark Star'
inscription: Inscription within the composition at lower left: L | O | V | E | I searched | for the mountain | where I remembered | the rainbow: I did | not know it lay | now under | the Dark Star
medium: Watercolor with linoleum block print and collage on paper
provenance: The artist, San Francisco; [Farhat, San Francisco (private dealer)]; by descent to Maymanah Farhat, New York; given to MIA, 2019.
title: Love
